S

saveLevel() - Method in class Editor.GLevelEditor
 
Seeker - Class in Character
Seeker Enemies search for the nearest Player Character and try to approach it They use a Pathfinder to get the shortest path to the Player If there exists no path or it is already very close, it just tries to move towards the Player When the Graphics of the Seeker and the Player overlap, the Seeker kills the Player
Seeker(double, double) - Constructor for class Character.Seeker

SerializedBool - Class in Network
The SerializedBool class is used to send a serialized boolean array from Client to Server.

Stone - Class in Editor
The Stone class is a child of the Field class and is simply the type of field which is solid, and does not change even when bombs explode in its vicinity
Stone(Stone) - Constructor for class Editor.Stone
